before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"82g00","text":"We strongly recommend wearing gloves and using nuclease-free tubes and reagents to avoid RNase contamination. Reactions are typically 20 μl but can be scaled up as needed. Reactions should be assembled in nuclease-free microfuge tubes or PCR strip tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"86j1u","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1upll","text":"The kit formulation allows for efficient capped RNA synthesis using cap analog (ARCA). The recommended ratio of cap analog to GTP is 4:1. Increasing the ratio of cap analog to GTP will increase the proportion of capped RNA transcripts; however, it also significantly decreases the yield of the reaction. Cap analogs are sold separately. Please refer to the companion products section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":357,"length":18}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"90235DE760CD11EAA0250242AC110004","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/e2050-hiscribe-t7-quick-high-yield-rna-synthesis-kit#tabselect2"}}}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5to9s","text":"The kit formulation allows for efficient capped RNA synthesis using cap analog (ARCA).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":[]}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"alrmg","text":"We strongly recommend wearing gloves and using nuclease-free tubes and reagents to avoid RNase contamination. Reactions are typically 20 μl but can be scaled up as needed. Reactions should be assembled in nuclease-free microfuge tubes or PCR strip tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"2a1ck","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7o65k","text":"The kit formulation allows for efficient capped RNA synthesis using cap analog (ARCA). The recommended ratio of cap analog to GTP is 4:1. Increasing the ratio of cap analog to GTP will increase the proportion of capped RNA transcripts; however, it also significantly decreases the yield of the reaction. Cap analogs are sold separately. Please refer to the companion products section.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":357,"length":18}],"data":{}},{"key":"863on","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a6l2e","text":"Cap analog (ARCA, NEB #S1411) is supplied in a lyophilized form of 1 µmol per tube. Dissolving it in 25 μl nuclease-free water will yield a concentration of 40 mM.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"offset":18,"length":10}],"data":{}},{"key":"a78ne","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3053i","text":"The yield per reaction is 30–40 μg RNA with approximately 80% capped RNA transcripts. Figure 1 shows the time course of capped RNA synthesis from 1 µg control template. Most reactions will be complete in 1 hour.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"d3ddg","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"1kjjg","text":"Figure 1. Capped RNA Synthesis with ARCA","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":40}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ho6r","text":"Reactions were incubated at 37°C in a thermocycler. Transcripts were purified by spin columns and quantified on a NanoDrop Spectrophotometer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":0,"length":141}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"8ADB4B8B685245FAA97E0545A6DAB1B6","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/e2050-hiscribe-t7-quick-high-yield-rna-synthesis-kit#tabselect2"}},"1":{"type":"link","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"720409207F4845B187C4AA33A870A174","url":"https://www.neb.com/products/s1411-3-0-me-m7g5ppp5g-rna-cap-structure-analog"}},"2":{"type":"imageblock","mutability":"","data":{"guid":"FEACE73CA64E42DA9DCDF3C4CC1A2333","height":null,"is_video":false,"mime":null,"original_name":null,"placeholder":"data:image/jpeg;base64,","source":"data:image/jpeg;base64,","width":null}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2d96v","text":"Thaw the necessary kit components, mix and pulse-spin in a microfuge to collect solutions to the bottoms of tubes.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
